name: Oracles of the Candescent Peak
description: Hailing from Widowâ€™s Peak, the Oracles of the Candescent Peak are known for their exceptional candescent flashmarble craftsmanship. Now, after unfurling a cursed scroll and discovering secrets few others in Kharth know, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
